page.title: 04 Work in Weaverthorpe
page.content: My Dad is a{joiner.}His boss is called Mr. J. Skelton. He goes to work at 7:45 till 12:00, from 12:45 to 5:00. He sometimes then does overtime until 8:30. He doesn't always work at the Joiner's shop. He goes to build and repair houses and make window frames. My Mum works at home in the{shop and {Post Office,}which is open from 9:00 till 5:30 on Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, Friday and mornings only on Wednesday and Saturday. On Sunday morning the shop opens for about 2 hours. She has an assistant, Jill, who comes on Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday, from 9:00 till 11:00. On Friday Jill comes back from 3:00 till 6:00 to do the books while Mum goes to a Driffield bank to post the cheque books. By Karen and Claire.
